entry.title: Replacement Battery For Samsung Galaxy Tab S 8.4 T700
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck Battery
Type: Battery
Price: 19.99

You have a Samsung Galaxy Tab S 8.4 that no longer holds a charge the way it did when it was new?

Your Samsung Galaxy Tab S 8.4 shuts down unexpectedly?

Does your cell phone only work when the battery is plugged in?

Those are common symptoms that a defective battery will have.

It is time to get a new Samsung Galaxy Tab S 8.4 replacement battery.

The old battery in your cell phone can swell inside and damage the internals.

Our Batteries for Samsung Galaxy Tab S 8.4 are brand-new batteries coming directly from our manufacturer. They are custom-built for customers who demand the same quality as original Samsung batteries. 

  • Zero cycle count
  • Tested under extreme weather
  • 100% New with premium components
  • High output current capacity
  • 1 Year Warranty

Compatibility

This battery is only compatible with a Samsung Galaxy Tab S 8.4.

Warranty

The Replacement Samsung Galaxy Tab S 10.5 Battery comes with a 1-year warranty, as the other Samsung Battery Replacement Parts.

Part Type Battery
Compatible Model Samsung Galaxy Tab S 8.4 T700 / T705 / T707
